steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"andp0","text":"Harvest lymph nodes (superficial cervical, mandibular, axillary, inguinal, and mesenteric) from mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"DDCF7903C4D54A68A377FD3A1DE65154","id":664769,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes"}
steps.section: Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"bbmhj","text":"Tease lymph nodes through a sterile 70-\u00b5m nylon cell strainer to obtain single-cell suspensions in complete IMDM containing 10% FCS (complete medium).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"FFFA4159FF1F4F6BA0BA7373E46D9CB8","id":664770,"previous_id":664769,"previous_guid":"DDCF7903C4D54A68A377FD3A1DE65154","section":"Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes"}
steps.section: Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"1tqm","text":"Resuspend cells in complete medium and use your favorite method to isolate CD4+cells. Consider using our MojoSort\u2122 Mouse CD4 T Cell Isolation Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":78,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":105,"length":41,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":105,"length":40,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https:\/\/www.biolegend.com\/mojosort-mouse-cd4-t-cell-isolation-kit-11870.html"}}],"guid":"4A34D594C5DD4631893CF05D09DFB86F","id":664771,"previous_id":664770,"previous_guid":"FFFA4159FF1F4F6BA0BA7373E46D9CB8","section":"Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes"}
steps.section: Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"c8mbv","text":"On day 0, coat 60 x 15mm of plastic petri dishes with anti-mouse CD3\u03b5, clone 145-2C11 (5\u00b5g\/ml). Incubate at 37\u00b0C for 2 hours or 4\u00b0C overnight. Aseptically decant antibody solution from the plate. Wash plate 3 times with sterile PBS. Discard liquid.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":249,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"96jgj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"0DFB9AF0B86911E8892B2398124E90A9","duration":7200,"label":"","step_guid":"C40168A3F1B047F5A13255350781A01F"}}],"guid":"C40168A3F1B047F5A13255350781A01F","id":664772,"previous_id":664771,"previous_guid":"4A34D594C5DD4631893CF05D09DFB86F","section":"Th9 Polarization of CD4+ Cells:"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erlec","text":"Plate CD4+ cells at 10 x 106\/5 ml\/dish. Culture cells for 3 days in the presence of anti-mouse CD28, clone 37.51 (5\u00b5g\/mL), recombinant human TGF-\u03b21 (10ng\/mL), recombinant mouse IL-4 (10ng\/mL), recombinant mouse IL-2 (20ng\/ml), and anti-mouse IFN-\u03b3, clone XMG1.2 (10\u00b5g\/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":27,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"9DE259926A544EF1B27EBF2521321F92","id":664773,"previous_id":664772,"previous_guid":"C40168A3F1B047F5A13255350781A01F","section":"Th9 Polarization of CD4+ Cells:"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1o05","text":"On day 3, wash cells once and then restimulate in complete medium with 500ng\/ml PMA and 500ng\/mL ionomycin, in the presence of monensin for 6 hours.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":149,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"169E7380B86911E8892B2398124E90A9","duration":21600,"label":"","step_guid":"84676A4D87124B2592768BE9ED41DBD4"}}],"guid":"84676A4D87124B2592768BE9ED41DBD4","id":664774,"previous_id":664773,"previous_guid":"9DE259926A544EF1B27EBF2521321F92","section":"Th9 Polarization of CD4+ Cells:"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2vsq","text":"After harvesting, the cells are ready for staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7vbta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"770b9","text":"Note: Recombinant human TGF-\u03b2 is effective for stimulating mouse cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":6,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"2A43CE2F8C0641279EC8CCA5786DCAC2","id":664775,"previous_id":664774,"previous_guid":"84676A4D87124B2592768BE9ED41DBD4","section":"Th9 Polarization of CD4+ Cells:"}
